alert.note: Alert for Central Willamette Valley; Greater Portland Metro Area; South Willamette Valley (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 01 at 2:36PM PST until January 03 at 1:00AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM SUNDAY TO 1 AM PST MONDAY... * WHAT...South winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts to 45 mph expected. Locally higher wind speeds possible in the Central and Southern Willamette Valley, and far eastern Multnomah County near the entrance to the Columbia River Gorge. * WHERE...In Washington, Greater Vancouver Area. In Oregon, Greater Portland Metro Area, Central Willamette Valley and South Willamette Valley. * WHEN...From 2 PM Sunday to 1 AM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Gustier conditions possible along higher terrain, especially along the central and southern Willamette Valley. Area bridges and overpasses may experience stronger winds.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. Please monitor the forecast for any updates.

area.areaDesc: Central Willamette Valley; Greater Portland Metro Area; South Willamette Valley
